document.body:
Budget Soda Fountain Counter Stools
THE ONLY PLACE TO SIT in the 1950's soda fountain, lunch counter, 1950's kitchen, food court, modern fast food restaurant or diner restaurant. Our Budget Priced, floor mounted counter stools feature heavy duty commercial construction. The fountain stools below can be made in 26"and 30"seat heights. The 26"seat height is for counters 36"to 38"high. Budget fountain stools can be shipped UPS. Please request a quotation if you are considering a large order.
#5907 Chrome Ring Budget Soda Fountain Stool
Soda Fountain Stool #5907 Chromed Steel Seat Seat is 14"Diameter Column is 2 ¾ "Diameter Bottom"Bell"Cover is 7½"Diameter Integral Base Plate Attachment is 6 5/8"Diameter X 1/8"thick steel with four 3/8"holes for floor attachment anchors (not provided). Stool is equipped with a revolving swivel
Click For Detail Photograph of the #5907 Soda Fountain Stool
Click For Budget Soda Fountain Stool General Layout Details
Click For Budget Soda Fountain Stool Construction Details
26"Seat Height Budget Floor Mounted Counter Stools
2 - 6 $124.00 each 7 - 10 $119.00 each 11 + Call for quote!
30"Seat Height Budget Floor Mounted Counter Stools
2 - 6 $114.00 each 7 - 10 $109.00 each 11 + Call for quote!
Plus Shipping Charges June, 2012
Pricing is based on orders upholstered in a single color material. Orders that require that stools be many different colors may be charged a fee for additional factory set-up time and increased wasted material.
T23 Orange
T27 Yellow
T73 Crimson
T12 Royal Blue
T59 Pumpkin
T84 New Yellow
T04 Chestnut

T66 Med. Green
T63 Teal
T106 Green Apple
T48 Jade

T77 Light Grey
T54 Platinum
If you are doing critical color matching please request free vinyl upholstery samples. Other materials are also available but selections different than those shown shown on this page may affect cost and delivery time.
